content.text: And them that are turned back
And it shall come to pass in the day
, and all such as are clothed
And it shall come to pass in that day
And it shall come to pass at that time
thee, that there shall be no inhabitant
This shall they have for their pride
unto them: for he will famish
me: how is she become a desolation
, so that there is no man
against me: for then I will take away
of thee: thou shalt not see
, [who] are of thee, [to whom] the reproach
where they have been put to shame
